title: Detect Traps
data:
{{Obsolete}}

'''Detect Traps''' was a level 2 [[Divinations]] spell which revealed any [[trap]]s in the caster's [[LOS]].

It was formerly found in the following sources:
*[[Book of Surveyances]] 
*[[Rod of Exploration]]

==History==
Detect Traps was removed in [[0.6]] with the removal of the Divinations school of magic.

[[Category:Divination]]
[[Category:Level 2 Spells]]
[[Category:Obsolete spells]]
